Table.Name: HP_SoftPaq_Missing
Table.SQL: SELECT computers.computerid as `Computer Id`, computers.name as `Computer Name`, clients.name as `Client Name`, computers.domain as `Computer Domain`, computers.username as `Computer User`, Computers.BiosMFG as `Computer.Hardware.Manufacturer`, IF(INSTR(computers.os, 'server')>0, 1, 0) as `Computer.OS.IsServer`, IF((Computers.flags & 2048) <> 0, 1, 0) as `Computer.Hardware.IsVirtual` FROM Computers LEFT JOIN inv_operatingsystem ON (Computers.ComputerId=inv_operatingsystem.ComputerId) LEFT JOIN Clients ON (Computers.ClientId=Clients.ClientId) LEFT JOIN Locations ON (Computers.LocationId=Locations.LocationID) WHERE ((((Computers.BiosMFG = 'Hewlett-Packard') AND (IF(INSTR(computers.os, 'server')>0, 1, 0)=0) AND (IF((Computers.flags & 2048) <> 0, 1, 0)=0) AND (NOT ((((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Software WHERE Software.ComputerId = Computers.ComputerId AND Software.Name = 'HP Softpaq Download Manager')>0)))))))
